title: [小拜拜] Joe Biden 其實一心只係想踢波

replies.msg:
小拜拜既年幻期
1) 拜登出世正當家道衰落
Biden's father was initially wealthy but suffered financial setbacks around the time Biden was born, and for several years the family lived with Biden's maternal grandparents. Scranton fell into economic decline during the 1950s and Biden's father could not find steady work. (from wiki)

小拜拜既學生期
2) 拜登擁有足球運動細胞，自幻已經係班上領導人
Biden was a standout halfback and wide receiver on the high school football team; he also played baseball. Though a poor student, he was class president in his junior and senior years. He graduated in 1961.

小拜拜既大學生活
3) 拜登讀書唔掂，波牛黎
At the University of Delaware in Newark, Biden briefly played freshman football and earned a Bachelor of Arts degree in 1965 with a double major in history and political science, and a minor in English. He had a C average and ranked 506th in his class of 688. In 1968, Biden earned a Juris Doctor from Syracuse University College of Law, ranked 76th in his class of 85

小拜拜個人慘事
4) 拜登並非孌童，而係因為佢好多年前死咗老婆同一歳個女(Naomi)。之後隔咗9年不斷做愛先生到個女 (Ashley Blazer)
On December 18, 1972, a few weeks after the election, Biden's wife and one-year-old daughter Naomi were killed in an automobile accident while Christmas shopping in Hockessin, Delaware.

小拜拜從政
5) 小拜拜中意搞環保人權，但唔中意打仗落仔，因為一來佢文科歷史出身二來佢早年 4) 失去兩個至親。嚴格黎講，佢係平和既人黎
During his early years in the Senate, Biden focused on consumer protection and environmental issues and called for greater government accountability. In a 1974 interview, he described himself as liberal on civil rights and liberties, senior citizens' concerns and healthcare but conservative on other issues, including abortion and the military conscription

而以下係佢出色既政漬:
1) Federal Assault Weapons Ban (1994)
2) Violence Against Women Act (1994)

6) 小拜拜絕對唔中意 LGBT 因為佢家族係天主教徒, 而佢讀天主教學校。佢本人都表明過係呢類議題上係相當保守
In 1993, Biden voted for a provision that deemed homosexuality incompatible with military life, thereby banning gays from serving in the armed forces. In 1996, he voted for the Defense of Marriage Act, which prohibited the federal government from recognizing same-sex marriages, thereby barring individuals in such marriages from equal protection under federal law and allowing states to do the same.

小拜拜爭奪總統之位
7) 1987 年第一次宣佈參選，但佢真係唔識字... 要 plagiarism，如果係遲幾十年出世應該比 turnitin 捉到傻
Biden formally declared his candidacy for the 1988 Democratic presidential nomination on June 9, 1987. By August his campaign's messaging had become confused due to staff rivalries, and in September, he was accused of plagiarizing a speech by British Labour Party leader Neil Kinnock

荷蘭夜了，之後再 summarize
